about_the_game:
The cool and complete soundtrack for the roguelike ARPG game Lost Castle! Enjoy it!

Featuring 12 addictive instrumentals - all composed & produced by Spanish musicians, Sonotrigger. Take these tracks with you on your daily treasure hunting shenanigans. One can always use a good soundtrack while out adventuring right?

- Track List -

  • The Lost Castle
  • The Darkness Beneath
  • Goblin's Paradise
  • Hallowed Ground
  • Gardener's Lament
  • In The Depths
  • Dig Deep
  • Treasure Hunting
  • Defying Death
  • Road to Perdition
  • Demon Daycare
  • For Justice or for Treasure


Songs will be downloaded to the music folder in your Steam Directory. For example:
[…]\Steam\steamapps\music\Lost Castle Official Soundtrack
